Headline: #3 King Drive & #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive & 151 Sheridan buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, &  Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive & #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Hubbard, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Exp & #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 146 In LS/Mchgn Exp & 147 Outer DuSable LS Exp buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express & #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Hubbard, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Wacker, State, Ohio, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Wacker, then resume their normal route on Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stony Island/76th
ShortDescription: NB 28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 76th, Jeffery, 75th & Stony Island, due to police activity near Stony Island/76th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 76th, Jeffery, 75th, then resume their normal route on Stony Island, due to police activity near Stony Island/76th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
